patch.description: Reorders a work item by updating its stack rank based on surrounding items. Uses LexoRank algorithm to calculate the new position between prevRank and nextRank.

prevRank.description: Stack rank of the item above the new position (null if moving to top)

nextRank.description: Stack rank of the item below the new position (null if moving to bottom)
